text: CVR Partners: Still Not Too Late For Likely Double Digit Yields. CVR Partners units offer a compelling forward yield near 20% for 2026. Healthy product demand and global supply issues support strong fertilizer prices. CVRP declared a higher-than-expected Q3 distribution of $4.02, with Q4 and early 2026 distributions forecasted above $5 per quarter. CVRP benefits from cheap US natural gas, unique petroleum coke feedstock, and ongoing investments to boost reliability and capacity, reducing risk of zero distributions.
label: positive

text: Okta: Cheap Entry Into A High-Margin Growth Story. Okta, Inc. is a leading cybersecurity firm in identity and access management, currently trading at a forward P/E of 26. OKTA delivered its 20th consecutive double-beat quarter, with strong double-digit revenue and EPS growth, premium margins, and a sticky customer base. Despite recent sell-off, OKTA appears undervalued given its dominant market share, high growth rates, and significant tailwinds from AI-driven cybersecurity demand.
label: positive

text: Tims China Announces Issuance of Senior Secured Convertible Notes and Amendment to Existing Convertible Notes. SHANGHAI and NEW YORK, Oct. 31, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- TH International Limited (Nasdaq: THCH), the exclusive master franchisee of Tim Hortons restaurants in China (“Tims China” or the “Company”), today announced that it has entered into a definitive agreement for the issuance of Senior Secured Convertible Notes. Additionally, THCH announced amendments to its existing 2024 unsecured convertible notes.

CROX struggles with weak consumer demand, ineffective promotions, margin erosion, and a heavy debt load, despite cost-cutting initiatives. Q3 results showed revenue down 6.2% year-over-year, with further declines and margin compression expected in the critical holiday quarter.

text: Lincoln National's Turnaround Impresses (Rating Upgrade). Lincoln National is upgraded to a buy as turnaround efforts drive improved capital position, balance sheet, and sustainable growth. Q3 results were strong, with operating income up for the fifth straight quarter, solid annuity sales, and improved Life segment profitability. LNC's investment portfolio remains high-quality, with minimal credit risk and rising book yields supporting future free cash flow growth.

text: Zeekr Group Announces October 2025 Delivery Update. HANGZHOU, China , Nov. 1, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- ZEEKR Intelligent Technology Holding Limited ("Zeekr Group" or the "Company") (NYSE: ZK), the world's leading premium new energy vehicle group, today announced its delivery results for October 2025. In October, Zeekr Group delivered a total of 61,636 vehicles across its Zeekr and Lynk & Co brands, representing increases of 9.8% year-over-year and 20.5% month-over-month.

text: Energy Fuels: Earnings Preview And Growth Outlook. Energy Fuels dominates U.S. uranium production while expanding into rare earths and medical isotopes, positioning itself as a leading critical materials supplier. Strategic inventory retention allows Energy Fuels to benefit from projected uranium price increases but adds complexity to valuation. A $700 million convertible note strengthens liquidity, funds growth initiatives, and uses a capped call to mitigate potential shareholder dilution.

text: COWZ: A Possible Explanation For This Cash Cows ETF's Lackluster Returns. COWZ provides consistent exposure to 100 high-quality U.S. stocks trading at cheap valuations, as measured by free cash flow yield. COWZ's recent returns have been disappointing, and over the last year, it's been one of the worst-performing cash-flow-focused funds on the market. This article lists the 15 others I track. High quality is COWZ's current advantage, but my fundamental analysis reveals its peers generally offer a better growth and value combination. Notably, VFLO is superior to COWZ on both metrics.

text: MAXSMAKING INC. REPORTS FIRST HALF OF FISCAL YEAR 2025 FINANCIAL RESULTS. SHANGHAI , OCT. 31, 2025 /PRNEWSWIRE/ -- MAXSMAKING INC. (NASDAQ: MAMK) ("MAXSMAKING" OR THE "COMPANY"), A MANUFACTURER OF CUSTOMIZED CONSUMER GOODS WITH A FOCUS ON ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY AND INNOVATION, TODAY ANNOUNCED ITS UNAUDITED FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE FIRST HALF OF THE FISCAL YEAR ENDED APRIL 30, 2025. FIRST HALF OF FISCAL YEAR 2025 FINANCIAL SUMMARY REVENUE WAS $12.40 MILLION FOR THE FIRST HALF OF FISCAL YEAR 2025, REPRESENTING AN INCREASE OF 27.43% FROM $9.73 MILLION FOR THE SAME PERIOD OF LAST YEAR.

text: XRP ETF Coming November 13 After Canary Capital Removes Final Roadblocks. Asset manager Canary Capital has taken a major step toward launching the first spot XRP ETF, submitting an updated S-1 filing to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The firm removed the “delaying amendment” that previously prevented the ETF from becoming auto-effective, setting up a potential November 13 launch date, pending Nasdaq's approval of its corresponding 8-A filing.
